disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

gluttony.question: Did I excessively indulge in eating or drinking at social gatherings, such as sporting events, parties, or family reunions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when trying to celebrate milestones or enjoy time with loved ones?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I let my financial priorities be dictated by excessive and wasteful gambling, thereby compromising my responsibilities to provide for my family's needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I been reckless in my spending habits, putting personal indulgences before my family's financial obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked resources entrusted to me, prioritizing leisure activities over my financial obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing private affairs or faults
for my own entertainment or pride
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing private affairs or faults, even if true, for my own entertainment or pride?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs , even among friends or family members
even among friends or family members
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even among friends or family members?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeking reconciliation in my personal relationships
anger.question: Have I held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation in my personal relationships?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.

impurity.question: Did you use substances, practices, or objects to intentionally prevent pregnancy in your marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
